inout¶

class inout.XMLIO.XMLIO(simulator, rootElementName='')[source]¶

Bases: object

XML Input and Output

loadNet(filename)[source]¶

Parse XML file and prepare data for object creation.

Parameters:filename – Filepath to XML file which shall be loaded.
Return [ netName, subnets, serConnections, serPlaces, serTransitions ]:
 A list containing lists for object creation.
netToXML(subnet, placesS, transitionsS, connectionsS)[source]¶

Save Colored Petrinet Subnet to XML tree.

Parameters:
  • subnet – Subnet name.
  • placesS – Place contained in subnet.
  • transitionsS – Transitions contained in subnet.
  • connectionsS – Connections contained in subnet.
saveLog(logList)[source]¶

Save Log Entries to XML tree.

Parameters:logList – List of log entries from the log widget.
saveNet(filename)[source]¶

Save XML tree to file.

Parameters:filename – Filepath where the XML tree is saved.
